attributes.description:
This is the SJ-Series Forester 2.5i Lineartronic with X-Mode All Wheel Drive, Reversing Camera, Full Leather Interior, Factory Alloy Wheels with new tyres, Full Service History, all books and keys. Finance available (Approx R3650pm with R5000 deposit), Extended Warranty available, and trade-ins considered.

ENQUIRIES:
To enquire, or for any additional information or assistance, please feel free to call Or WhatsApp Aaron on 083 453 8968 or e-mail autoranch@mweb.co.za. Viewing times are Mon-Fri from 9am-5pm, Saturdays 9.30am-12pm.

WHERE TO FIND US:
We are located at the John Montague Centre in Montague Gardens, corner 1st Road and 3rd street, rear parking area of the centre, across from the Takealot depot. If possible, please call or WhatsApp message ahead to ensure the car you are interested is available and ready to view and drive.

Subaru Forester 2.5 X Lineartronic CVT

Power -  126 kW @ 5800 rpm
Torque -  235 Nm @ 4100 rpm
Economy - 8.1 l/100km
Emissions - 187 g/km
Emissions Rating - EU5
Gears - 0 / ALL
Acceleration - 9.9 seconds
Top Speed - 196 km/h
Airbags (total) - 7
Length - 4,595 mm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 60 litres
Boot Capacity - 505 litres
Service Intervals - 15,000 km
